name: Agar.cc
storyline: You are a tiny circle. Eat other tiny circles to get bigger. Eat or be eaten. Dominate to legend, or fade into obscurity.
summary: A faster paced, more aggressive variant of the popular multiplayer browser game, Agar.io. In this version you can rapid fire spit mass, or grow your mass quickly using viruses. Team up with your friends to dominate the universe, or play alone and show off your solo skills.
